main event: A report was made of a sighting of a round object in Lexington, Kentucky on 6 November 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as a round long streamer and was seen waving or vibrating to and fro.,The object was approximately the size of a dime.,The sighting lasted for about 5 to 10 seconds.,The report concludes that the object was probably a meteor or possibly a balloon or aircraft.,Another sighting in 1952 reported a pinhead sized object heading northeast for three minutes.
witness description: no witnesses reported in the document
